Package actions.targeters.targets

Class TileTarget

  • java.lang.Object
    • actions.targeters.targets.TileTarget
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HavingPointLike, PointLike, SuperTile, TargetedSelector, Visible, Targetable
    public class TileTarget
extends java.lang.Object
implements Targetable, PointLike, SuperTile, TargetedSelector, Visible, HavingPointLike
    This class represents a Tile in the sandbox as well as a tile being targeted

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      TileTarget​(TileUID id)
      This is a temporary structure needed to deal with the bootstrap phase of the Sandbox, during which TargetTiles and Sandbox both need each other to be created

      • distanceSelector

        public java.util.Set<TileUID> distanceSelector​(Sandbox sandbox,
                                               int radius,
                                               boolean logical)
        Description copied from interface: PointLike
        The method used for the "distant [from] this" selector
        Specified by:
        distanceSelector in interface PointLike
        Parameters:
        radius - is the maximum distance, anything less than 0 should return an empty set, with 0 returning just the UIDS.TileUID of the current cell
        logical - if true don't cross walls
        sandbox - the sandbox on which to evaluate the function
        Returns:
        a list of reachable points in the given amount of steps or less
        See Also:
        PointLike.distanceSelector(Sandbox, int, boolean)

      • reachedCondition

        public boolean reachedCondition​(Sandbox sandbox,
                                int min,
                                int max,
                                PointLike source,
                                boolean negation)
        Specified by:
        reachedCondition in interface TargetedSelector
        Parameters:
        min - the minimum included distance (0 includes the current tile, negative values return an empty set
        max - the maximum included distance
        source - the PointLike Target for which reachableSelector is calculated
        negation - whether the condition should be negated or not
        Returns:
        negation XOR this tile can be reached by source in the given range
        See Also:
        TargetedSelector.reachedCondition(Sandbox, int, int, PointLike, boolean)

      • distanceCondition

        public boolean distanceCondition​(Sandbox sandbox,
                                 int min,
                                 int max,
                                 @NotNull
                                 @NotNull PointLike source,
                                 boolean negation,
                                 boolean logical)
        Specified by:
        distanceCondition in interface TargetedSelector
        Parameters:
        min - the minimum included distance (0 includes the current tile, negative values return an empty set
        max - the maximum included distance
        source - the PointLike Target from which the distance is calculated
        negation - whether the condition should be negated or not
        logical - if true don't go through walls
        Returns:
        negation XOR this tile is in the given distance range from source
        See Also:
        TargetedSelector.distanceCondition(Sandbox, int, int, PointLike, boolean, boolean)
